articles.title: Assailant with bow and arrows kills 5 people in Norway
articles.description: COPENHAGEN, Denmark (AP) — A man armed with a bow fired arrows at shoppers in a small Norwegian town Wednesday, killing five people before he was arrested, authorities said. The police chief in the community of Kongsberg, near the capital of Oslo, said there was “a confrontation” between officers and the assailant, but he did not elaborate.
articles.content: Police stand at the scene after an attack in Kongsberg, Norway, Wednesday, Oct. 13, 2021. Several people have been killed and others injured by a man armed with a bow and arrow in a town west of the Norwegian capital, Oslo. (Hakon Mosvold Larsen/NTB ... [2419 chars]

articles.title: Debate over net zero in Australia is heating up as calls for more climate change action grow. Here's the background
articles.description: An internal debate in the federal Coalition is heating up over climate change ahead of the COP26 global climate conference, so expect to hear a lot about a net zero carbon emissions target over the coming weeks.
articles.content:
An internal debate in the federal Coalition over climate change is heating up, and the Prime Minister is facing calls to attend the COP26 global climate conference next month.

articles.title: COVID-19 data reporting, current outbreaks, Homecoming, and flu shots: Dr. Guan’s final update to the KFL&A community
articles.description: (Kingston, Ontario) Dr. Hugh Guan, Acting Medical Officer of Health (MOH) for Kingston, Frontenac, Lennox and Addington (KFL&A) Public Health, provided his final regular COVID-19 update to the local media on Wednesday, Oct. 13, 2021.

articles.title: Teenage boys killed in ‘catastrophic’ crash involved in altercation only minutes before
articles.description: Victoria Police has released CCTV of the altercation, which took place about five kilometres from the scene of the collision, about eight minutes before it happened.
articles.content:
Several teenage boys killed in a “catastrophic” collision with a truck west of Melbourne were involved in an altercation in the middle of a road only minutes earlier, police have revealed.

articles.title: Man With Bow and Arrow Kills Five in Norway
articles.description: As the country went on alert, the police scrambled to investigate an attack in a town 50 miles outside Oslo.
articles.content:
OSLO — A man armed with a bow and arrow went on a rampage in a Norwegian town outside Oslo on Wednesday, killing five people and wounding two others in the deadliest attack in Norway in a decade, the authorities said.
The police said they had taken a... [541 chars]

articles.title: Fed doesn't need to 'destroy the economy' to beat inflation
articles.description: "Be patient. Don't panic. We're getting there. The seeds of deflation are being planted as we speak," the "Mad Money" host argued Wednesday.
articles.content:
CNBC's Jim Cramer said Wednesday he believes inflationary pressures in the U.S. can be relieved without the Federal Reserve hiking interest rates, an action he thinks would be damaging for the economy.
